name: pointy
description: 5% chance of slowing adjacent snails down every eth block

name: catapult
description: 1/2 point has chance of throwing "blue shell" at 1st place. Blue shell reverses 1st place's direction (match speed) for one leg

name: shiny
description: on 1st 3 blocks has 50% chance of +15% distance traveled per block

name: cyborg
description: for each consecutive win has 1% chance per block to move an additional 10% units

name: glass
description: fast but fragile (if trips die, winner doesn't collect), if adjacent to snail of same color get speed boost

name: koopa
description: same as koopa and has 8% chance to swap place with snail directly in front of it

name: koopa with wings
description: 80% resistance to negative effects, for each consecutive win has 1% chance per block to move an additional 8% units

name: egg
description: gives everyone a new snail at end of race

name: bomb
description: 5% chance to end race early per leg, starts at 20% of 3rd leg race (slow snail)
